title: No train service between Bugis and Aljunied

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Train services btwn #Bugis and #Aljunied have ceased. Free regular and bridging bus services have also ceased. Thank you for your patience and we apologise to all affected commuters.

[EWL] UPDATE: No train services btwn #Bugis and #Aljunied. Free regular and free bridging bus are available between Bugis and Aljunied. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/H0JXeZNw6a
[EWL] UPDATE: No train services btwn #Bugis and #Aljunied. Free regular and free bridging bus are available between Bugis and Aljunied.

[EWL] UPDATE: No train services btwn #Bugis and #Aljunied. Free regular and free bridging bus are available between Bugis and Aljunied. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/YxfqNiZDVT
[EWL]: Due to an incident, there is no train svc btwn #Bugis and #Aljunied. Free regular and free bridging bus are available between Bugis and Aljunied.
